entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range.
